name: IHE_mACM_Mobile_Report_Characteristics_Event_Phase
title: IHE mACM: Mobile Report Characteristics: Event Phase
description: IHE mACM CodeSystem for: Mobile Report Alert Characteristics: Event Phase

concept.display: Event Phase: start (of an interval event/alert) – an end is expected
Event Phase: start – continue and end are not to be expected
Event Phase: continuation (of an ongoing interval event/alert)
Event Phase: end (of an interval event/alert)
Event Phase: event/alert is active at this time
Event Phase: escalation of an ongoing alert/alarm
Event Phase: de-escalation of an ongoing alert/alarm
Event Phase: pause an event/alert; could restart with same ID later
